description: A simple Terminal Server software providing transparent pipe either in TCP server or TCP client socket mode from TCP/IP to a pre-configured serial port.
notes: serial-to-ip is a simple Terminal Server software providing transparent pipe either in TCP server or TCP client socket mode from TCP/IP to a pre-configured serial port.
Implemented in C# for .NET 2.0 so the command line version could work in Mono-runtime as well.
